author: John Nolte
title: Nolte: Chinese Propaganda Quotes Hillary, Chris Cuomo, Richard Engel to Rip Trump
description: Democrats and multinational media corporations will always put greed and their left-wing political agenda before American lives (ask Ferguson and Baltimore about that).
content:
A new round of Chinese propaganda has just confirmed what we already knew: Democrats such as Hillary Clinton and fake news staffers such as Chris Cuomo and Richard Engel are doing China’s bidding.
There is a long history of naming a virus or disease after th… [+3074 chars]
